name: B3 Snake Escape
description:
This is Snake Escape B3.
Guide Simon the Snake through many rooms, and head for the exit.

Catch stars, to get extra points, take keys to open doors. Eat pills to get short again(!).  And do not forget the ever ticking timer.

There is not more to say. This is as simple as it gets. 

Use the keyboard. No, do not use the mouse or try it on you tablet.  This is old school. This is Retro! Old school graphics (text mode only, PETSCII based). Old school sounds. (All sounds are synthetic). Even old school programming language BASIC.   If you are done playing, press escape, and edit and modify the game listing, if you want.

But most importantly, it is free, it is fun, and try to have blast!
